results.description: Wolves' first appearance in the main stage of a European competition since 1980 ends in defeat by Sporting Braga in their Europa League group opener.
results.title: Wolves 0-1 Sporting Braga: Hosts beaten in Europa League opener

results.description: A newly promoted team with an Englishman at left-back are shaking up the established order in the Portuguese top-flight and sitting top of the league.
results.shortTitle: The minnows leading the way in Portugal
results.title: Famalicao: The minnows with an English left-back who are leading the way in Portugal

results.description: Brazilian winger Kenedy and Ghanaian defender Baba Rahman leave Chelsea for season-long loan deals in Spain.

results.title: Chelsea: Kenedy and Baba Rahman leave on season-long loan deals in Spain

results.description: Sporting Lisbon's former Liverpool defender Sebastian Coates gives away three penalties and gets sent off as Sporting lose at home.
results.shortTitle: Three penalties and a sending-off - Coates endures a Sporting nightmare
results.title: Sporting Lisbon 2-3 Rio Ave: Sebastian Coates sees red after conceding three penalties

results.description: West Brom borrow West Ham midfielder Grady Diangana, Benfica striker Chris Willock and Sporting Lisbon winger Matheus Pereira.

results.description: Wolves sign Renat Dadashov from Portuguese side Estoril and send the striker on loan to Pacos de Ferreira.
results.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers sign Azerbaijan striker Renat Dadashov

results.description: Porto goalkeeper Iker Casillas is given a role on the club's coaching staff as he continues his recovery from a heart attack suffered two months ago.
results.title: Iker Casillas given coaching role at Porto two months after having heart attack

thumbnail.altText: Iker Casillas watching Porto play from the stands

results.title: Joao Felix: Atletico Madrid keen to sign Portuguese forward from Benfica

results.description: Carlos Carvalhal has returned to management in his native Portugal, despite "several offers" from clubs in England.

results.title: Carlos Carvalhal: Former Swansea boss returns to management in Portugal

results.description: Benfica avoid a slip-up against Santa Clara to secure their 37th Portuguese league title on Saturday.

results.description: The Checkatrade Trophy final drew a record crowd, but where does it rank in a list of this weekend's games?
results.title: Which games had the biggest attendance?

results.description: Former Tottenham midfielder Adel Taarabt finally makes his Benfica first-team debut - nearly four years after signing for the Portuguese club.
results.title: Adel Taarabt makes first Benfica outing after nearly four years

results.description: Real Madrid agree to sign defender Eder Militao from Porto at the end of the season for his buy-out clause of 50m euros (Â£42.7m).

results.description: Benfica become the first team since 1965 to score 10 goals in a Portuguese Primeira Liga match as they thrash Nacional.
